content: It was bad enough that he usually came to work late, but coming in drunk was the last straw, and I'm going to have to let him go.
translations: ita:Era sufficientemente brutto che di solito andasse a lavorare tardi, ma entrare ubriaco è stata l'ultima goccia, e dovrò
